# LibraryArtistSortProperties

**Protocol**

Artist properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryArtistSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **albumCount**: The number of albums from this artist.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the artist to the library.
- **name**: The name of the artist.

items.description: The number of albums from this artist.
items.name: albumCount
